Posts.Content: Holidaysimone wrote:  I am a 52 year old woman, with heterogeneously dense breasts. In June I started having severe pain in my right breast.  After some weeks I finally saw my Gyn, who sent me for a mammogram and ultrasound.  My diagnosis:  complex sclerosing lesion, fibroadenomatoid hyperplasia, and usual intraductal hyperplasia.  I now have an appointment to see a breast surgeon.  Even though I looked everything up, should I still be worried? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Pathology report Holidaysimone mistytee
